About Me!

Dennis Lu

(Full-Stack Web Developer)

  • Front-End: HTML5/CSS3, JQuery, Bootstrap, ReactJS, Sass
  • Back-End: RESTful Api, SpringMVC
  • MEAN Stack: MongoDB, Express. Angular, NodeJS
  • LEMP Stack: Linux, Nginx, Apache, Mysql, Php
  • OOP: Java, C++, Javascript, Python, Golang
  • Cloud: AWS Certified Solutions Architect

Work experience

Learn more my work life

  • Sep 2015 - Jan 2016

    Pro-Tek Consulting (Intern)

    `

    Designed dynamic and multi-browser compatible pages with HTML5, CSS3, JQuery and JavaScript. Used AJAX with jQuery to parse JSON object to dynamically overlay contents on web pages Worked on creating Controllers, Factories and services for optimizing the AngularJS application code and also to manage the shared services. Implemented Routers & History in Single Page App (SPA) as a part of Backbone JS implementation.

  • Sep 2014 - Jun 2015

    Interactive Visual Media Lab of University of Dayton

    Designed dynamic and browser compatible pages by using HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, JavaScript, AngularJS1. Research the background subtraction algorithm to realize the foreground extraction algorithm for interactive media and vison gaming with Kinect (XBOX). Create 3D modeling and adopt illumination and shading technology to display object more realistic.

  • Jan 2016 - Current

    Google Inc.(contractor)

    Maintenance Google Advertise Product AMP (Accelerated Mobile Pages Project).
    Collaborate Closely with GCM (Google Cloud Messaging) team to ensure GCM stable running.
    Support developers troubleshoot, debug code issue in Firebase Cloud Messaging.

Contact

Let's talk!

Any front-end/full-stack developer opportunites are welcomed! Willing to relocate. Please contact me to get my most recent resume!
